<!DOCTYPE html>
<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/gh/kitao/pyxel/wasm/pyxel.js"></script>
<script src="https://cdn.jsdelivr.net/pyodide/v0.26.4/full/pyodide.js"></script>
<script>
async function main() {
// Pyodideを初期化
const pyodide = await loadPyodide();
await pyodide.loadPackage("micropip");

// .whlファイルをPyodideにロード
await pyodide.runPythonAsync(`
    import micropip
    await micropip.install("https://yutams.github.io/game01/pymunk-6.11.0-cp312-cp312-pyodide_2024_0_wasm32.whl")
    import pymunk
`);
launchPyxel({ command: "play", name: "shot_bullet.pyxapp", packages: "micropip", gamepad: "enabled", base64: "" });
}
main();
</script>
